author: cmpilato
msg: On the 'log-g-performance' branch, value correctness over network
consumption.  Don't try to filter out revisions we've already
delivered.  In most cases, this scenario won't exist; in others we
really should honor the mergeinfo, even if it hurts.
Now cache mergeinfo only in the ascending (figure now, send later)
case.  Also, don't bail on processing just because we see a
revision we've already seen.  Update call to
parameters, and update call to do_merged_logs().
because now the path to it doesn't bail early due to hitting the
